players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana has been found dead so early in the game. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure we can identify the mafia among us."

Charlie: "I agree with Alice's sentiment. Let's all be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words. The mafia among us may try to deceive us, but we can work together to uncover the truth."

Charlie: "I believe we should focus on building trust and cooperation within our group. Let's try to share information openly and work together to identify any suspicious behavior or patterns that may indicate the presence of the mafia among us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob
